level.heading: Administrative penalty.
level.text: The Mayor may assess a civil penalty against an athlete agent not to exceed $25,000 for a violation of this part.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following ยง 47-2887.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 17 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act. See Vol. 7, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
